title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, usable in Node or browsers via a lightweight npm package.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models for chat, embeddings, and tool-calling pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (formerly Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat interface, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compatible endpoint.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with async, streaming, and embedding helpers; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline assistant.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app bootstrapped with Vite and the official ollama-js client.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that streams answers from local Ollama models using slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for chatting with Ollama models across macOS, Linux, and Windows.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community scripts: bulk model downloader, OpenAI adapter, and Prometheus metrics exporter.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Turn-key RAG starter using Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store, and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake that packages Ollama and common models for reproducible deployments.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBever SQL client plugin that adds an AI assistant powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-github-actions
summary: GitHub Action to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-dependent code.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot that answers questions using Ollama models with thread support and rate limiting.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama chat & embed APIs for use by any MCP client.

title: ollama-cli-extensions
summary: Bash completions, fzf model picker, and Zsh aliases to supercharge the native ollama CLI.
